img_summary: The image depicts a set of black, spherical objects tied with string, placed on a decorative plate. Based on the preceding and following text, this image is likely associated with an item called "Celestial Lotus Seeds" from the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The seeds are described as rare and have the effect of slowly recovering a small amount of health when used. They can be found at the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain. The image serves to visually represent these in-game items.
